page.title: 10A LOWESTOFT CHILD'S DAY
page.content: I normally get up at 7.30 & have toast & cornflakes for breakfast. I wash & and get dressed for school. Mum takes me in the car with my friend Lisa. We talk in the playground until the whistle blows. In class we do English, my favourite lesson is Dictionary Work. Our topic this term is Plants & I have just planted my Nasturtiums & have to measure them. For lunch I have ham sandwiches, crisps & yogurt. In the playground Lisa & I play skipping or tag. In the afternoon we do Maths & have Drama in the hall. After school I have gymnastics club, & I help with the younger children. When I go home I have chips, bacon, beans & ice-cream for tea. I go out to play after tea until mum calls me in. Then I watch television until it is time for bed at 9 o'clock.
